title: Cannot Log In
body:
I has been unable to log in into League since yesterday. It kept saying that "An unexpected error occurred while logging in. Please try again. If this issue persists, contact support at support.riotgames.com". And none of the solutions mentioned in the connection issues guide work. I even tried the Legacy Client but still didn't work :|

I noticed there are other players who are experiencing the same issue as me, so Riot please fix it quickly! 

Thanks.

replies.body:
Hey.  i have the same issue.
can someone send me VPN connection ?

man i have the same issue since this morning. I had this problem before in the past. Emailed support and went through a lot of things but still couldn't fix it. Then I realized the problem was from my country's connection to America server due to bad weather and all. So I had to wait for the internet company to fix it.
This time is the same problem but it's not from my country. The connection and everything is fine. I can play other games in NA server easy, only League I can't.
Support told me to try use VPN connection in the mean time so maybe u guys try that. I try it and it works, just it causes your ping to raise real high and VPN is not always healthy so consider it if u guys have to and just want to log on.
Btw, I created another acc but in EU West server and i can log in just fine. I know it's weird and I really don't have any idea how to fix this. I think it has something to do w the new patch 'cause after the update i have this issue.
Exactly. I was wondering is the Asia IP got banned. This happened once before but things got back to normal after a few days. So i guess we have to wait to see.
me too , i'm from asia and can't log in , i try use vpn fake US ip and i can log in . maybe Riot ban ip outside America ?
Exactly. Seem like Asia IP got banned maybe temporarily. This has happened once before. So I think we have to wait for a few days.
i'm in Asia and cannot log in too . I use VPN and can log in , but it make game more higher ping

It sounds like your network might be having problems reaching the authentication servers, which is the same for either client.  If the guide was unable to help, then hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team will help out.  Be sure to grab the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to attach some logs to the ticket.  We'll get back to you!
